description:
Angry Bunnies is a challenging physics-based demolition, with addictive gameplay set in 3D Stereoscopic scenery. There are 150 fun levels to enjoy, perfectly suited for short bursts of gaming. Each level requires logic and force to solve.

Game Features:

3D stereoscopic experience

150 streamlined levels

Challenging physics-based demolition

Comical characters with special abilities

Hours of gameplay and replay value
name: Angry Bunnies
